alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Baldwin Inland; Butler; Conecuh; Covington; Crenshaw; Escambia; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal; Mobile Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 31 at 12:56PM CDT until November 01 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT TODAY FOR SOUTHEAST MISSISSIPPI AND PORTIONS OF INTERIOR SOUTHWESTERN ALABAMA AND A RED FLAG WARNING IS IN EFFECT AREAWIDE WEDNESDAY DUE TO CRITICALLY LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES COMBINED WITH GUSTY NORTHERLY WINDS... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM CDT WEDNESDAY FOR THE ENTIRE AREA... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 056, 057, 058, 059, 060, 201, 202, 203, 204, 205, 206, 261, 262, 263, 264, 265 and 266. * WINDS...North 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 to 20 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and persistent severe to extreme drought intensity over the local area can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Baldwin Inland; Butler; Conecuh; Covington; Crenshaw; Escambia; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal; Mobile Inland
